definition: disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶穌基督後期聖徒教會

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Mo4 shi4 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶穌基督末世聖徒教會

sentences.english: Nature to a saint is sacramental.
sentences.chinese: 自然對一個聖徒來說是神聖的。

sentences.english: And the Holy Spirit indwelling the saints co-operates with Christ in this blessed work.
sentences.chinese: 聖徒裏面內住的聖靈與基督一同執行這件神聖的工作。

sentences.english: If you Google for Eustace you'll find that he has no official standing among the beatified.
sentences.chinese: 假如用谷歌搜索，你會發現尤斯塔斯並非官方的聖徒。

sentences.english: For he views the Corinthiansas already saved.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在他看來哥林多的聖徒已經得救了。

sentences.english: When Saint Joan was twelve she first heard a Voice from God in her father's garden.
sentences.chinese: 十二歲時，貞德在父親的花園裏首次聽到聖徒的聲音。

sentences.english: A liturgy, he's taking some help to what he calls "the saints" in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 一次禮拜，他把捐助帶給耶路撒冷的聖徒。

sentences.english: Fache's eyes hardened. "You think Saunière is calling the Church a lame saint and a Draconian devil?"
sentences.chinese: 你是說索尼埃把教會稱作瘸腿的聖徒和嚴酷的魔王？

sentences.english: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus, and of the love which ye have to all the saints
sentences.chinese: 因聽見你們在基督耶穌裏的信心，並向衆聖徒的愛心。

sentences.english: His father is a pious confessor.
sentences.chinese: 他父親是個虔誠的聖徒。

sentences.english: An open entrance weselves tempt a saint.
sentences.chinese: 一扇開著的大門可一個聖徒。

sentences.english: Mr Jeffs is the leader of the Fundamentalist Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints( FLDS).
sentences.chinese: 傑夫是耶穌基督末世聖徒原教旨教會的教主。

sentences.english: slaves soon noticed that many Catholic saints resembled their own ancestral gods.
sentences.chinese: 奴隸們很快發現許多天主教聖徒都和他們的祖神類似。

sentences.english: Paul also said they had love for all the saints.
sentences.chinese: 保羅還稱讚他們向衆聖徒顯出愛心。

sentences.english: Another miracle will need to be recognized for him to become a saint.
sentences.chinese: 他還需要再次被認定行有神蹟後才能成爲聖徒。

sentences.english: And this is what Paul saw in theCorinthians.
sentences.chinese: 這就是保羅在哥林多的聖徒裏看到的。
並非所有人都能像聖徒那樣生活。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
to suffer a calamity/to suffer (e.g. under torture)/distress
